<h2>Who are we?</h2>

[HostWithLinux](https://hostwithlinux.net) has been providing <b>quality</b> shared hosting at budget prices since 2012, and have recently expanded into VPS hosting. Our Black Friday VPS plan are perfect for those who need a high ram VPS for running a game server, cPanel or MySQL server at budget pricing. HostWithLinux is proud to be incorporated in the United Kingdom as a Private Limited company, and offers ticket, live chat, email and UK phone support for verified accounts. Not happy with your purchase? We offer a 30 day money back guarantee, providing no terms of service have been broken.

Our Black Friday high ram VPS special is limited stock, grab one while you can! 

<b>[Black Friday OpenVZ Special - $6 a month](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/order.php?step=1&productGroup=5&product=40)</b>

* 4GB Guaranteed Ram
* 4 Shared CPU Cores
* 100GB Disk Space
* 2TB Premium Bandwidth on 500mbit port
* 1 IPv4 Address, IPv6 on request
* OpenVZ with SolusVM Control Panel

<b>Black Friday OpenVZ Storage</b>

<h2>Location and servers</h2>

We use SuperMicro servers located in QuadraNet LA, and all our VPS's are backed up monthly to remote storage. The VPS node is on gigabit connection, however VPS's are limited to 500mbit - this can be increased on a case by case basis.

<h2>Contact Us</h2>

Feel free to [PM me](http://lowendtalk.com/messages/add/linuxthefish), [create a support ticket](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/index.php?fuse=support&controller=ticket&view=submitticket) or send an email to support(at)hostwithlinux.net if you have any questions, queries or worries.

Please make sure to read our [terms of service](https://hostwithlinux.net/tos.html) before you order, and additional IP's can be bought for $1 with justification. Thank you for your time, and sorry for the badly written offer!
